QuestData.Title: Lava Burst
QuestData.Description:
The Primalists have torn apart the mountain to send their forces streaming to Vakthros!
I spied some lava orbs in the initial corridor that they're using to spread more of their elemental chaos.
Destroy them to help slow their advance. I'll do what I can from up here to help Kalecgos.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Khadgar's projection further within the Vakthros Range.
QuestData.RewardText: That should slow them down a bit. It seems I'm getting a bit rusty compared to the fight with the Burning Legion...
